title: Allow Target to be specified as metadata on Projects passed to msbuild
body:
Can we allow Target to be specified as metadata on the Project passed to msbuild in addition to being an attribute on msbuild? For example, the following would invoke my.csproj using MyTarget:

```
<ItemGroup>
    <Project Include="my.csproj">
        <Target>MyTarget</Target>
    </Project>
</ItemGroup>
<MsBuild Projects="@(Project)" Targets="Build" />
```
